scripts.start: npm run init-db && npx nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.sequelize-skeleton: npx sequelize init:models; npx sequelize init:config
scripts.init-db: cd /usr/local/Cellar/mariadb@10.1/10.1.43_1/bin && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS jsbbs; CREATE DATABASE jsbbs CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root -p && cd -
